amendment.description: Amend the title so as to read: "A bill to increase pollution, endanger the public health, and not address taxes in any way.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to change the title of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A013) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Polis.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A013) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A013) Failed by voice vote.
